content:
The provided chunk is part of a Python function that handles the termination of a profiling operation. It constructs an ending message (`suffix`) to mark the conclusion of a profile session, appends this along with other results into a string, and performs cleanup by removing specific global variables related to profiling. This code is situated within a larger module that includes various utility functions and classes for profiling, debugging, and performance analysis.

suffix = '***** END PROFILE: %s *****' % name
        if log:
            print(suffix)
        else:
            _ProfileResultStr = '%s\n%s\n%s' % (prefix, _ProfileResultStr, suffix)
        result = builtins.globalProfileResult[0]
        del builtins.globalProfileFunc
        del builtins.globalProfileResult
        return result
